nodes.text: Ral Garas was a male Ishi Tib who served as an advisor to King Amand of the planet Molos. After the Battle of Yavin, with the support of the Rebel Alliance, Garas helped plan an uprising on the planet with the help of the Alliance sergeant Trask.
Garas appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game sourcebook Lead by Example.
